name: @bmb-inc/monorepo
description: BMB Inc monorepo containing shared packages and services.
author: BMB Inc

scripts.publish:all: yarn workspaces foreach --all --no-private version patch && yarn workspaces foreach --all --no-private npm publish
scripts.publish:types: yarn workspace @bmb-inc/types version patch && yarn workspace @bmb-inc/types npm publish
scripts.publish:constants: yarn workspace @bmb-inc/constants version patch && yarn workspace @bmb-inc/constants npm publish
scripts.publish:utils: yarn workspace @bmb-inc/utils version patch && yarn workspace @bmb-inc/utils npm publish
scripts.publish:sagitta-soap: yarn workspace @bmb-inc/sagitta-soap version patch && yarn workspace @bmb-inc/sagitta-soap npm publish
